meanings.definition: A person who tells jokes or plays pranks.
meanings.sent1: The jokesters at the party had everyone laughing with their funny stories.
meanings.sent2: The comedian was known as one of the best jokesters in town.
meanings.sent3: The jokesters decided to prank their friend by hiding all his shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her witty remarks turned her into the jokester of the office.
meanings.sent5: The jokester's humor brightened up the gloomy day.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in humorous or playful behavior.
meanings.sent1: The group of jokesters entertained the children with their silly antics.
meanings.sent2: During the talent show, the jokesters performed a hilarious skit.
meanings.sent3: The jokesters couldn't resist pulling a harmless prank on their teacher.
meanings.sent4: In the park, the jokesters were like playful kittens chasing each other.
meanings.sent5: The jokesters' lightheartedness brought joy to everyone around them.
